operation.name: insert
operation.sql: insert into discount(bandar_note_number, proposer_id, amount, state, expire_date, create_time, modify_time) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

operation.name: update
operation.sql: update discount set bandar_note_number=?, proposer_id=?, amount=?, state=?, expire_date=?, modify_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=?

operation.name: getByCondition
operation.sqlmap: select d.* from discount d <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="enterpriseName"> d.proposer_id in (select e.id from enterprise e where e.name = #enterpriseName#) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="bandarNoteNumber"> d.bandar_note_number = #bandarNoteNumber# </isNotEmpty> <isEqual prepend="and" property="showExpire" compareValue = "false"> ${cdata-start} d.expire_date >= CURRENT_DATE ${cdata-end} </isEqual> </dynamic> order by id DESC <isEqual prepend="" property="doPage" compareValue = "true"> limit #pageNum#, #pageSize# </isEqual>
